page.title: 09HOUSES IN THE LONG LEE AREA
page.content: We went out into our area to find out about the{local houses.}We wanted to know about the{size of gardens,}the {building materials}of the houses,the {age}of the houses and if they had {extensions}or not. We walked around the area and saw that most people had extensions on their houses. These were dormers and garages with a bedroom above. Most people in our area have a large garden and not many people have small or open plan gardens. Most of the houses are about thirty or more years old, although there is a new Barratt Estate in the middle of the older houses. Most of the houses in our area are semi_detached although there are a few bungalows and cottages. There were more detached than terrace houses. Most houses were pebble-dashed or stone built.{
